link.description: Results-oriented professional with 5+ years of experience in requirement analysis, design, and execution of software development projects. Skilled in implementing REST services using Node.js and Express.js, Javascript, Es6 with proficiency in MongoDB for efficient database management. Demonstrates elementary knowledge of MySQL. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams, showcasing the ability to quickly grasp and apply new technologies. Specialized in implementing JWT authentication and authorization mechanisms, ensuring robust security measures. Committed to delivering high-quality solutions and contributing to successful project outcomes with git and docker container deployment.
